items.title: This AI Pioneer Could Deliver $18 EPS by 2027 — Here’s Why Investors Are Buying IBM (IBM)
items.description: International Business Machines Corporation (NYSE:IBM) is one of the 12 AI Stocks Every Investor Should Be Watching. On June 16, Evercore ISI analyst Amit Daryanani raised the stock price target to $315 from $275 and kept an “Outperform” rating on the shares. According to the firm, IBM can sustain mid to high single-digit sales growth and […]

items.title: IBM: Big Blue, Big Valuation, Big Bullish Momentum
